summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Light and Power Plant and System, and providing for the acquisition from S. Morgan Smith Company of York, Pennsylvania, U. S. A., and Westinghouse Electric and Manufacturing Company of East Pittsburg, Pennsylvania, of and payment for, certain hydraulic and electrical machinery and equipment and designating the same as additions and betterments specified by Ordinance No. 54006; authorizing the execution of an agreement with respect thereto and appropriation funds therefor.
